mapper.select: select invoice_due_date, (DATE_PART('year', current_date::date) - DATE_PART('year', invoice_due_date::date)) * 12 + (DATE_PART('month', current_date::date) - DATE_PART('month', invoice_due_date::date)) as mpd, tenant_id, id from invoices where invoice_status_id in (16,17) and tenant_id = #{tenant_id}
